active_incidents.title: Some users have trouble receiving 2FA code via SMS

notes.body: We're currently keeping an eye on the situation and will inform you as soon as the problem with SMS 2FA codes is completely fixed, or if we have any new information to share.
We're seeing signs of improvement, but we're still monitoring the situation. We'll confirm once the issue with SMS 2FA codes is fully resolved or we have another update to share.
We’re receiving reports around trouble receiving 2FA codes via SMS. We’re on the case and will provide another update once we have more details to share. We’re sorry for the disruption.
